data.comment: Today's referee, Ji Um Cho, has blown to start the match.
Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in high up the field for Pohang Steelers in Pohang.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in the half of Seongnam.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 7, Pohang Steelers's Ha Chang-rae misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pohang.
In Pohang a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Seongnam to take a throw-in in Pohang Steelers territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Stanislav Iljutcenko for Pohang Steelers drives towards goal at Pohang Steel Yard. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
Can Pohang Steelers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
In the minute 16, Ji Um Cho signals a Pohang Steelers throw-in in Seongnam's half.
Ji Um Cho awards the home team a throw-in.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Seongnam.
In the minute 20, Goal! Na Sangho gives Seongnam a 0-1 lead in Pohang.
Free kick Pohang Steelers.
Free kick Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 25, Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
Pohang Steelers have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
In the minute 32, Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half?
Pohang Steelers drive upfield and Stanislav Iljutcenko gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Seongnam defender.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 33, Stanislav Iljutcenko (Pohang Steelers) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Manuel Palacios (Pohang Steelers) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
In the minute 34, Ji Um Cho awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Ji Um Cho signals a Seongnam throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Throw-in Seongnam.
Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
In the minute 42, Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Seongnam.
Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 46, Nam Il Kim is making the team's first substitution at Pohang Steel Yard with Lee Jae-won replacing Jamshid Iskanderov.
Kim Hyeon-seong is replacing Yang Dong-hyeon for Seongnam at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 47, Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in the half of Seongnam.
In Pohang, Aleksandar Palocevic of Pohang Steelers is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 48, Ji Um Cho signals a Pohang Steelers throw-in in Seongnam's half.
Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half?
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
In the minute 52, Stanislav Iljutcenko (Pohang Steelers) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Pohang Steel Yard.
Pohang Steelers are coming forward and Aleksandar Palocevic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Seongnam have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Goal! Pohang Steelers have got their heads in front thanks to a Stanislav Iljutcenko strike.
In Pohang Pohang Steelers attack through Lee Seung-mo. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pohang.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 62, Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Seongnam push forward at Pohang Steel Yard and Na Sangho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Pohang Steelers defence.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The home team have replaced Manuel Palacios with Song Min-kyu. This is the first substitution made today by Gi Dong Kim.
In Pohang a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 66, Ji Um Cho awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Throw-in for Seongnam close to the penalty box.
In the minute 70, Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
Can Pohang Steelers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seongnam's half?
Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 72, Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
At Pohang Steel Yard, Stanislav Iljutcenko has been yellow-carded for the home team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Gi Dong Kim (Pohang Steelers) is making a second substitution, with Shim Dong-un replacing Lee Kwang-hyeok.
Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 76, Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
The away team replace Park Tae-jun with Tomislav Kis.
Pohang Steelers's Lee Seung-mo is on target but unsuccessful.
Ji Um Cho signals a Seongnam throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Pohang Steelers will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Seongnam.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 84, Free kick Seongnam.
Seongnam are pushing forward but Kim Dong-hyeon's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
In the minute 86, Aleksandar Palocevic of Pohang Steelers gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Seongnam at Pohang Steel Yard.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Seongnam.
Free kick in a good position for Pohang Steelers!
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
Ji Um Cho awards Seongnam a goal kick.
In Pohang a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tomislav Kis for Seongnam gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half?
Pohang Steelers needs to be cautious. Seongnam have an attacking throw-in.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Pohang Steelers make their third substitution with Jun jae Nam replacing Stanislav Iljutcenko.
